articles.description: In a sign that customers might be getting tired of splashing their cash on expensive gadgets, Samsung and Apple, have both released two new models that can be bought for under £450.

articles.title: EE users can unlock a new Apple subscription worth £60 without adding to their bills - Express
articles.description: APPLE fans on the EE network can unlock a six month Apple News+ subscription worth roughly £60 plus the previous offer of a complimentary Apple Music plan. Here's everything you need to claim the bonus.

articles.title: Samsung 4K and 8K TVs get three new channels for FREE, but there's a catch - Express
articles.description: SAMSUNG Smart TV owners can tune into three new channels for free without installing an extra app - or paying a penny for the new shows. However, these freebies are not available everywhere, so some 4K and 8K TV owners will miss out.
